title: Fight for a Better Future
itunes:author: Guest: Elizabeth Oates
itunes:summary:
What do you see when you look back on your family history? For some, there are beautiful memories, but for others, it's a history of brokenness. No matter what your story is, John and Danny will encourage you that God can help you live out a better future. Featuring Elizabeth Oates.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Elizabeth Oates' book "Mending Broken Branches" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-07-27?refcd=1132601

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/fight-for-a-better-future/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
